title: Diamond Flower Pendant - Mohana Mala Locket
materials: Clarity: VS1-VS2). Meticulously crafted with a high-shine finish.
features: Features a delicate floral design with three smaller flowers at the top and two larger flowers below, set in a modern prong setting to maximize the brilliance of the diamonds. The openwork design enhances the overall lightness and elegance. Contemporary design that seamlessly integrates into traditional South Indian aesthetics.
colors: Rose Gold and Dazzling White Diamonds
creating a subtle and elegant contrast.
occasions: and festive occasions. Can also be paired with traditional attire for special events like weddings (vadhuvu) or engagements (nischitartham)
description: This exquisite pendant combines the timeless beauty of floral motifs with the brilliance of diamonds and the warmth of rose gold. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable wear, while the intricate detailing reflects exceptional craftsmanship. A modern take on a classic design, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection.
